#Text=Our clients and prospects ask us , " How can I grow my business and capture my fair market share ?

column1: #Text=Physically search out only the true professionals .
#Text=Create a list of those podcasters that undeniably know exactly what they are doing .
#Text=Align yourself with only the best .
#Text=From this list , call them on the phone and pick their brain(s) .
#Text=If you cannot locate an actual telephonic point of contact , wipe them from your list .
#Text=You want to do business with those that believe in " touching " their market with more intimacy and one-to-one personalization rather than just an email .
#Text=Remember , you are looking for a friend . A mentor .
#Text=Not necessarily someone to take your money and be off .
#Text=A solid partnership ( friendship ) is your objective here .
#Text=Discover Your Passion .
#Text=What passion do you share with others ?
#Text=What true value will your audience glean from you ?
#Text=Who is your target audience ?
#Text=Understand your " WHY " !
#Text=Develop Your Plan & Work Your Process .
#Text=What do you need to learn ?
#Text=What do you need to do ?
#Text=What specific date will you be ready ?
#Text=Who will provide you with the support you will need to fulfill your plan .
#Text=What equipment is required ?
#Text=Make Your Podcast Happen !
#Text=As you roll out your " new-to-you " adventure , do n't expect total perfection on day one .
#Text=Be kind to yourself and know that you will evolve .
#Text=We all started from square one .
#Text=Enough practice and desire can make you near perfect , but do be fair with you and give yourself time to grow .
#Text=Listen to other professional podcasters .
#Text=Listen to your local radio stations .
#Text=Read books and articles like this one on a daily basis .
#Text=No excuses !
#Text=If you really want to crank up the heat on your marketing efforts , than podcasting will give you the significant marketing advantage .
#Text=Tips

#Text=Podcasting is a term that manifested as a fresh way to describe the technology used to push ( share ) audio content from web sites down to consumers ( clients ) of that content , who usually listen to it on an iPod ( hence the term " pod " ) or any other type of .
#Text=mp3 player ( iRiver ) at their command , convenience and control .

#Text=Podcasting is somewhat similar to the concept of time-shifted video software and devices like TiVo , which let you watch what you want exactly when you want it by simply recording and storing video , except that Podcasting is primarily used for audio to date .
#Text=( Universal video deployment is most likely just around the corner . )
#Text=This easy to use emerging technology can be used to push ( deploy ) any kind of file such as photos ( images ) , software updates , videos and/or text .
#Text=Podcasting uses an XML-based technology called RSS ( Real Simple Syndication ) .
#Text=Content publishers ( podcasters ) describe new content in an XML RSS file which includes dates , titles , descriptions , and specifics links to the . mp3 files .
#Text=This " automatically " generated file is referred to as an RSS feed .
#Text=Dave Winer is considered by many to be the creator of RSS and a pioneer in the environment of applied XML .
#Text=The component to making podcasting work with RSS is " enclosures " ( remember that term ) , an element supported by RSS 2.0 .

#Text=As a consumer or end-user , you simply run an " aggregator " ( remember this term , too ) program like MTV 's Adam Curry 's iPodder software on your local computer , which lets you easily subscribe to RSS feeds .
#Text=Programs like Adam 's will either by schedule or by random design , download the RSS files , and check to see if any fresh content is available .
#Text=If new content exists , the audio files are automatically downloaded and put into a folder ( of your choice ) on your hard disk or directly routed to your mp3 player .

#Text=Anyone who properly learns ( from a real professional ) and activates their own podcast process can reap the significant harvest of BIGGER numbers by creating and nurturing their own emerging community .
#Text=As an online business owner , this is HUGE and required !
#Text=This marketing solution can not only make you financially solvent , it can even make you a " STAR " !
#Text=Accept no feeble excuses and get working on your very first podcast right away !
#Text=( At the very least , be sure to move podcasting up near the top of your " TO-DO " list !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Be sure to identify and experiment with all angles of marketing when it comes to producing an on-going , money-generating podcast production for all the world to hear and take notice !
#Text=Happy podcast Marketing !
